mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_client_api (api_id, base_url, api_key, completions_path, embeddings_path, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{apiId}, #{baseUrl}, #{apiKey}, #{completionsPath}, #{embeddingsPath}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, api_id, base_url, api_key, completions_path, embeddings_path, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_api ORDER BY id

SELECT DISTINCT a.id AS id, a.api_id AS apiId, a.base_url AS baseUrl, a.api_key AS apiKey, a.completions_path AS completionsPath, a.embeddings_path AS embeddingsPath FROM ai_client_config c JOIN ai_client_model m ON m.model_id = c.target_id AND m.status = 1 JOIN ai_client_api a ON a.api_id = m.api_id AND a.status = 1 WHERE c.source_type = 'client' AND c.target_type = 'model' AND c.status = 1 AND c.source_id IN
#{clientId}
